definition: to break a promise/to violate an agreement/to default (on a loan or contract)
to disobey/to violate/to separate/to go against
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

pinyin: xin4 dai4 wei2 yue1 diao4 qi1

sentences.english: Partial judges that we are of our own excellencies , and other men's defaults!
sentences.chinese: 这片面的判断源于我们的尊贵和别人的违约。

sentences.english: However, the assignor may be liable to the obligor for breach of contract.
sentences.chinese: 但是，让与人可能因而向债务人承担违约义务。

sentences.english: Some reform of the market for sovereign CDSs is needed.
sentences.chinese: 一些针对主权信用违约掉期的市场改革是必要的。

sentences.english: There are other costs associated with default.
sentences.chinese: 当然，违约还有另外一个成本。

sentences.english: Hernandez was taken to the police station after being arrested for defaulting on his contract.
sentences.chinese: 埃尔南德斯因在合同上违约而被捕并被送往警察局。

sentences.english: Default-insurance prices for Spanis h and Italian government bonds increased.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙和意大利国债的违约保险价格均有所上升。

sentences.english: The defaulting party shall be liable for all damage compensation.
sentences.chinese: 违约方应当承担全部损害赔偿责任。

sentences.english: Their message is that a default by a sovereign European government is "unthinkable".
sentences.chinese: 他们的要旨是不允许任何欧洲主权国家违约。

sentences.english: In the method, the fundamental breach of contract research should adhere to type subsumption approach.
sentences.chinese: 在方法上，根本违约的研究应坚持类型涵摄的方法。

sentences.english: The Ukraine and Pakistan have also defaulted in orderly fashion.
sentences.chinese: 乌克兰和巴基斯坦也曾发生过有序违约。

sentences.english: But finding new lenders after default is not easy.
sentences.chinese: 但希腊违约之后，将很难找到新的金主。

sentences.english: Default party will indemnify the non-breaching party for remedy of, but not limited to, the economic loss.
sentences.chinese: 违约方赔偿未违约方补救，但不限于经济损失。

sentences.english: Default party will indemnify the non-breaching party for remedy of, but not limited to, the economic loss.
sentences.chinese: 违约方赔偿未违约方补救，但不限于经济损失。

sentences.english: In such case the non-breaching party shall give a written notice to the other party to terminate this Contract.
sentences.chinese: 在此情况下，未违约方应书面通知违约方解除合同。

sentences.english: In such case the non-breaching party shall give a written notice to the other party to terminate this Contract.
sentences.chinese: 在此情况下，未违约方应书面通知违约方解除合同。

sentences.english: Any violation of deadlines contained in the contract will equate to breach of contract.
sentences.chinese: 凡违反合同规定的任何期限都等同违约。

definition: to break a promise/breach of contract
to be overdue/to fail to meet a deadline/to be behind in doing sth
